text: Daniel Kingsley “Dan” Povenmire (born September 18, 1963) is an American TV director, writer, TV producer, storyboard artist and actor. He is best known as the co-creator of the Disney animated series Phineas and Ferb. Povenmire also co-created the spin-off Milo Murphy’s Law and created its spin-off Hamster and Gretel. In 2022, Povenmire and his wife Clarisse had a divorce. ==References== ==Other websites== *Dan Povenmire on YouTube Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from San Diego Category:Writers from San Diego Category:American animators Category:American television directors Category:American television writers Category:American television producers Category:American voice actors
title: Dan Povenmire
